title: Smartarget Facebook Messenger - Contact Us
shortDescription: Allow customers to contact you using Facebook Messenger
longDescription:
Do you have a Facebook Messenger or Facebook Profile? Do you want to provide your website visitors approaching you there?

With 'Facebook Messenger - Contact Us' you can add a small icon on one of your website corners (any of them!) with your a short message as "Contact us" or "message us" etc. When user click on the icon - new tab will open with the Messenger chat so users can talk with you right away.
author: TopSoft UG

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: Limited features. Visible on homepage only.

products.title: Free Plus
products.shortDescription: No limitations. Visible on all pages. Still FREE!
